response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its unique features and high quality, the product is valued at $15,000 to me. However, considering its potential worth to you, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This represents a substantial saving of $3,000 compared to my usual pricing, making it an excellent opportunity for you to benefit from this investment. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 12000}
